name.info: Select the name for this poll
name.label: Poll Name

errors.minLength: Poll Name must be at least 3 characters long

location.info: Select the location of the poll (Continent, Country, State, City)

timeframe.info: Select the Start and End dates for the poll

continents.info: Select one or more continents to which this poll will apply
continents.label: Continent(s)

countries.info: Select one or more countries to which this poll will apply
countries.label: Country(ies)

states.info: Select one or more states to which this poll will apply
states.label: State(s)

cities.info: Select one or more cities to which this poll will apply
cities.label: City(ies)

startDate.info: Select the date when this poll starts
startDate.label: Start Date

errors.min: Start Date must be greater than today

endDate.info: Select the last date when this poll open
endDate.label: End Date

errors.min: End Date must be greater than today
errors.range: End Date must be on or after Start Date
